content: Hello! I'm Film Buff, your movies and TV shows assistant. How can I help you today?
What movies are trending this week?

Here are some of the trending movies this week:
1. **Black Bag**: When an intelligence agent is suspected of betraying the nation, her husband – also a legendary agent – faces the ultimate test of whether to be loyal to his marriage or his country. [More info]([TMDb](https://www.themoviedb.org/movie/1233575)]
2. **Holland**: Nancy, a teacher in Holland, Michigan, gets caught up in a twisted tale when she becomes suspicious of a secret. [More info]([TMDb](https://www.themoviedb.org/movie/257094)]
3. **A Working Man**: Levon Cade, a former military black ops, embarks on a search to bring his boss's daughter, who is like family to him, home from human traffickers. [More info]([TMDb](https://www.themoviedb.org/movie/1197306)]
4. **A Minecraft Movie**: Four misfits find themselves in the Overworld and must master this world while on a magical quest with expert crafter, Steve, to get back home. [More info]([TMDb](https://www.themoviedb.org/movie/950387)]
5. **Snow White**: Princess Snow White, aided by seven magical dwarves and a young thief named Jonathan, tries to survive the Evil Queen's pursuit and reclaim the kingdom. [More info]([TMDb](https://www.themoviedb.org/movie/447273)] (response from cache)
